info.description: TAQUITO, a Simple Digital Repository Management Layer API
info.title: taquito

post.description: Deposits a new resource into our digital repository. Returns the domain identifier for the resource.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: JSON-LD representation of the resource metadata going into our digital repository. Needs to fit the core MAP requirements.

401.description: You are not authorized to create a resource in TAQUITO.

415.description: Unsupported resource type or data format provided.

422.description: The resource JSON provided had an unspecified or unsupported field, or is otherwise unprocessable

500.description: This resource could be created at this time.

get.description: Retrieves the metadata (as JSON-LD) for an existing TAQUITO resource as identified by the TAQUITO identifier.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the requested resource

401.description: You are not authorized to view this resource in TAQUITO.

404.description: Resource not found. Please check your provided TAQUITO identifier.

500.description: The resource could not be retrieved by TAQUITO at this time.

patch.description: Updates the metadata for an existing TAQUITO resource. Only include required fields and fields you wish to change. Will return the TAQUITO resource identifier.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: JSON-LD Representation of the resource metadata only required fields and fields you wish to change (identified via its TAQUITO identifier).

401.description: You are not authorized to update a resource in TAQUITO.

415.description: Unsupported resource type provided. TAQUITO resources should be handed over as JSON or JSON-LD.

422.description: The resource JSON provided had an unspecified or unsupported field, or is otherwise unprocessable by TAQUITO.

500.description: This resource could be updated at this time by TAQUITO.

get.description: The healthcheck endpoint provides information about the health of the service.

503.description: The service is not working correctly

identifier.description: Identifier for a resource in TAQUITO.

data.description: Data for a resource in TAQUITO.

Resource.description: Domain-defined abstraction of a deposited 'work'. Resource's abstractions are describable for our domainâ€™s purposes, i.e. for management needs within our system.

@context.description: URI for the JSON-LD context definitions.

@type.description: The content type of the resource. Selected from an established set of values.

dedupeIdentifier.description: Identifier retrieved from identification.sourceId that stands for analog or source identifier that this resource is a digital representation of.

depositor.description: The Agent (User, Group, Application, Department, other) that deposited the resource into TAQUITO.

label.description: Primary processing label (can be same as title) for a resource.

identifier.description: Identifier for the resource within TAQUITO. UUID, unique for each new version of a TAQUITO resource.

version.description: Version for the resource within TAQUITO.

precedingVersion.description: Preceding version for the resource within TAQUITO.

followingVersion.description: Following version for the resource within TAQUITO.

copyright.description: The human readable copyright statement that applies to the resource.

embargoReleaseDate.description: Date when the resource is released from an embargo, if an embargo exists.

license.description: The license governing reuse of the resource. Should be an IRI for known licenses (i.e. CC, RightsStatement.org URI, etc.).

reuseAndReproductionStatement.description: The human readable reuse and reproduction statement that applies to the resource.

termsOfUse.description: License or terms of use governing reuse of the resource. Should be a text statement.

visibility.description: Percentage of the resource that is visibility during an embargo period

created.description: When the resource in TAQUITO was created.

deleted.description: If the resource has been deleted (but not purged).

gravestoneMessage.description: Message describing why the object was deleted.

isDescribedBy.description: Pointer to the PURL/XML file that is a traditional representation of the metadata for the resource.

lastUpdated.description: When the resource in TAQUITO was last updated.

partOfProject.description: Administrative or Internal project this resource is a part of.

sdrPreserve.description: If this resource should be sent to Preservation.

remediatedBy.description: The Agent (User, Group, Application, Department, other) that remediated a resource in TAQUITO.

catalogLinks.description: Links to catalog records for the resource that the resource represents in whole or part.

catalog.description: Catalog that is the source of the linked record.

catalogRecordId.description: Record identifier that is unique within the context of the linked record's catalog.

recordSchema.description: Metadata schema of the linked record.

deriveMetadata.description: If the resource descriptive metadata should be automatically updated when the linked record changes.

deliverMetadata.description: If the linked record should be automatically updated when the resource descriptive metadata changes.

recordScope.description: Whether the linked record describes a resource that is broader than, equivalent to, or narrower than the resource the resource represents.

doi.description: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for the resource within this repository.

sameAs.description: Another object, either external or internal to the system (if duplication occurs) that is the same digital resource as this resource.

sourceId.description: A source resource or object (perhaps but not necessarily analog or physical) that the resource is a digital representation of.

approvalRequired.description: Indicates if approval is required to deposit or manage the resource in TAQUITO.

approvers.description: Agents who are required to approve deposit or management of this resource in TAQUITO.

contains.description: Filesets that contain the digital representations (Files) of the resource.

hasAgreement.description: Agreement that covers the deposit of the resource into TAQUITO.

hasMember.description: Component or 'children' digital repository objects that are a part or portion of this 'parent' or aggregate resource.

isTargetOf.description: An Annotation instance that applies to the resource.

hasMemberOrders.description: Provided sequences or orderings of members of the Object, including some metadata about each sequence (i.e. sequence label, sequence type, if the sequence is primary, etc.).

Agent.description: An Agent - Person, Group, Organization, or other Acting body.

name.description: Primary label or name for an Agent.

sunetID.description: Stanford University NetID for the Agent.

Sequence.title: Resource Sequence
Sequence.description: A sequence or ordering of resources within a Collection or Object.

@context.description: URI for the JSON-LD context definitions.

label.description: Label for the sequence or ordering.

startMember.description: Identifier for the first member of the sequence.

members.description: Identifiers for Members in their stated Order for the Sequence.

title.description: a short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Title must contain at least three characters.
